author: Karl Carpenter
comment: My S6 battery life does not show correctly. It only shows 0%. Also it needs a 12 hour clock option, not just 24hr

reply.author: MobiDev Studio
reply.content: Thank you for your suggestion! We will add this option in later version.

title: It works. But needs a little more.

author: Lau Rent
comment: Does not display correctly on huawei watch

author: Joey Adler
comment: It needs some work because it says one of the batteries are at 0% and it's hard to tell which battery is the watch and which is the phone
